function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Person-to-person transmission of coronavirus in hospital and family settings.","Impact":"Increased spread of the virus within public and healthcare settings.","Mitigation":"Implement strict infection control measures, including personal protective equipment and isolation protocols for infected individuals.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C disinfection, and automated disinfection systems.","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and visitors in healthcare settings.","Owner":"Healthcare facilities and public health authorities."},{"Description":"Contaminated dry surfaces serving as a potential source of coronavirus transmission.","Impact":"Risk of self-inoculation of mucous membranes, leading to infection.","Mitigation":"Regular and thorough disinfection of surfaces with biocidal agents.","Technologies":"Automated surface disinfection systems, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI).","People":"General public, healthcare workers, cleaning staff.","Owner":"Public health authorities, facility management, cleaning companies."},{"Description":"Insufficient understanding of coronavirus persistence on inanimate surfaces.","Impact":"Lack of guidelines and protocols for effective surface disinfection.","Mitigation":"Research and data collection on coronavirus persistence, development of standardized disinfection protocols.","Technologies":"Surface swab sampling, real-time PCR for viral detection, surface testing technology.","People":"Health researchers, public health authorities, facility management.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies, facility management."}]}
